Description: CloudWatch Dashboards to visualize Application Load Balancer (ALB) resources. Both dashboards leverage Dashboard Variables to filter on the desired resources. Dashboard 'ALB_All_Resources' visualizes ALL ALB resources in the target region. Dashboard 'ALB_Individual_Resources' provides additional filters to isolate a specific ALB and the corresponding Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DefaultRegion.Description: Select the default region hosting the load balancers to be monitored.

DefaultALB.Description: Select the default load balancer to be monitored. (e.g. app/ALB-ABC/0123456789abcdef)

DefaultWebACL.Description: If WAF is associated with the default load balancer, select the corresponding WebACL. (e.g. sample-waf-name)

variables.label: Region
variables.customValues:
us-east-1, N. Virginia
us-east-2, Ohio
us-west-1, N.California
ca-central-1, Canada
us-west-2, Oregon
eu-west-1, Ireland
eu-west-2, London
eu-central-1, Frankfurt

properties.markdown:
## ALB Request Metrics
- Widgets below report on load balancer performance
- [Details on ALB metrics](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/latest/application/load-balancer-cloudwatch-metrics.html#load-balancer-metric-table)
- Here are troubleshooting guides for: 

[button:HTTP 403](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/alb-http-403-error) [button:HTTP 502](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-alb-troubleshoot-502-errors) [button:HTTP 503](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/alb-troubleshoot-503-errors) [button:HTTP 504](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/504-error-alb)
[button:Drop in RequestCount](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-requestcount-metric-drop)
[button:Unable to Access ALB](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-requestcount-metric-drop)

## Target Group Metrics
- Widgets below report on the application hosted behind the load balancer
- [Details on Target-level metrics](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/latest/application/load-balancer-cloudwatch-metrics.html#target-metric-table)
- Here are troubleshooting guides for: 

[button:Failed Health Checks](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-fix-failing-health-checks-alb) 
[button:High Latency](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-fix-high-latency-on-alb) [button:Increase in TargetResponseTime](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/alb-troubleshoot-targetresponsetime) [button:Session Stickiness](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-alb-stickiness) [button:Traffic Imbalance](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-fix-unequal-traffic-routing)

## TLS Metrics
- Here are troubleshooting guides for: 

[button:Client SSl/TLS Negotiation Errors](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-fix-ssl-tls-negotiation-error) 
[button: Client issues with mTLS](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-alb-mtls-client-connection-errors) 
[button: CA Bundle issues with mTLS](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-alb-mtls-ca-bundle-issues)

## Connection Metrics

- Here are troubleshooting guides for: 

[button:Connection Errors](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-alb-http-connection-errors) 
[button:Connection Timed Out](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-troubleshoot-connection-errors)

[button:ALB Authentication](https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/elb-configure-authentication-alb)
